subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Eugenie Bouchard of Canada was upset in her opening match at the Miami Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., by the qualifier Tatjana Maria of Germany, 6-0, 7-6 (4).
snippet: Eugenie Bouchard of Canada was upset in her opening match at the Miami Open in Key Biscayne, Fla., by the qualifier Tatjana Maria of Germany, 6-0, 7-6 (4).
